Here is the list of signs and their scores:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural leaders, Aries are often confident and charismatic, but can also be impulsive.
2. Taurus - 7.5/10 - Reliable and practical, Taurus excels at stability and material possessions, but can be resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Gemini's communication skills are exceptional, but they may struggle with focus.
4. Cancer - 8.5/10 - Nurturing and emotional, Cancers have strong family ties, but can be overly sensitive and moody.
5. Leo - 7/10 - Charismatic and passionate, Leos shine bright, but can also be arrogant and dominating.
6. Virgo - 8.5/10 - Analytical and hardworking, Virgos are detail-oriented, but may struggle with self-doubt and perfectionism.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and balanced, Libras strive for harmony, but can be indecisive and overly concerned with appearances.
8. Scorpio - 8.5/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpions are probing and perceptive, but may struggle with trust issues and jealousy.
9. Sagittarius - 7.5/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians love to explore, but can be reckless and blunt.
10. Capricorn - 8/10 - Disciplined and ambitious, Capricorns are driven to succeed, but may struggle with rigidity and pessimism.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians are innovative and visionary, but may struggle with detachment and rebelliousness.
12. Pisces - 8.5/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are dreamy and sensitive, but may struggle with boundaries and ambiguity.
Note: These scores are based on general sign descriptions and can vary depending on individual personalities and astrological configurations.
